comments:
I20061205-0800

- Preferences > Team > CVS > Synchronize/Compare:
    check "Show revision comparisons in dialog"

- have org.eclipse.core.expressions from CVS
- context menu on org.eclipse.core.expressions/ElementHandler.java, choose
    Compare With > History
- doubleclick an old revision

=> Eclipse enters neverending loop of StackOverflowErrors and starts hundreds of "ModalContext" threads. I had to kill the process.
